rows.label: qst702604_msg0001
rows.name:
A machine that collects gold
buried in the Dannagh Desert?!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0002
rows.name:
I don't think even the combined
technology of Iira could
create such a machine...

rows.label: qst702604_msg0003
rows.name:
No, but if it was salvaged, I can't
say for sure it's impossible...

rows.label: qst702604_msg0005
rows.name:
If you leave it to me, I'll
complete the great Gennai Special
Gold-Collecting Machine for you!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0009
rows.name:
Alright! The great Gennai Special
Gold-Collecting Machine is complete!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0010
rows.name:
Now, hurry to the Dannagh
Desert and try it out.

rows.label: qst702604_msg0011
rows.name: You don't need to report the results.

rows.label: qst702604_msg0012
rows.name:
It will definitely
succeed! Hee hee hee!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0015
rows.name:
You should leave it to me, the
best inventor in the capital!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0101
rows.name:
Now, hurry to the Dannagh Desert
and try out the great Gennai
Special Gold-Collecting Machine.
